invocations.description: Returns the avoidance level of a special area.
invocations.ex:
local areaAvoidance = getareaavoidance("SpecialArea1")

if areaAvoidance <= 50 then
	setareaavoidance("SpecialArea1", 150)
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll set the "SpecialArea1" avoidance level to 150 if it was lower than 50.
